title: Cold Shoulder
description: Lieutenant Lorraine Page had everything. Impossible to believe that she could be thrown out of the police force and end up on Skid Row. Lorraine's ex-colleagues soon forget her, as the hunt for a nightmare serial killer spirals into an all-out search for a missing witness. A victim who escaped and is now on the run ...from her life. Lorraine Page is that witness. Against her will she is drawn into the investigation. Forced to face her past and her overwhelming guilt ...'Lorraine Page, officer, wife and mother, is as tough as they come' - "Sunday Telegraph". 'Lynda la Plante once again shows her brilliance' - "Daily Express". 'Terrifyingly gripping ...don't read it late at night' - "Daily Mail".
author: Lynda La Plante
